vulnerability_to_control_mappings.vulnerability_name: MS17-010: Security Update for Microsoft Windows SMB Server (ETERNALBLUE)

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Critical SMB vulnerabilities directly impact flaw remediation requirements
xacta_mappings.business_impact: Critical - Domain controller compromise could lead to complete network takeover

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: SMB vulnerabilities can lead to unauthorized account access and privilege escalation
xacta_mappings.business_impact: High - Potential for unauthorized domain administrative access

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Web server vulnerabilities require immediate patching to prevent remote code execution
xacta_mappings.business_impact: Critical - Public-facing web services vulnerable to remote exploitation

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Web server vulnerabilities compromise network boundary protection
xacta_mappings.business_impact: High - Potential breach of network perimeter defenses

vulnerability_to_control_mappings.vulnerability_name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux : kernel vulnerabilities

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Kernel vulnerabilities in database systems require urgent patching
xacta_mappings.business_impact: Critical - Database servers contain sensitive business and financial data

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Financial system kernel vulnerabilities pose significant business risk
xacta_mappings.business_impact: Critical - Finance server handles sensitive financial transactions

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Firewall vulnerabilities compromise network security infrastructure
xacta_mappings.business_impact: Critical - Primary network security device vulnerability

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Firewall vulnerabilities directly impact boundary protection capabilities

vulnerability_to_control_mappings.vulnerability_name: Cisco IOS XE Software Web UI Multiple Vulnerabilities

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Network switch vulnerabilities allow privilege escalation
Web UI vulnerabilities allow unauthorized privilege escalation
xacta_mappings.business_impact: High - Unauthorized administrative access to network devices

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Exchange Server vulnerabilities require immediate attention
xacta_mappings.business_impact: Critical - Email system compromise affects business operations

vulnerability_to_control_mappings.vulnerability_name: SSL Certificate Signed Using Weak Hashing Algorithm

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: Weak SSL certificates compromise cryptographic protection
xacta_mappings.business_impact: Medium - Potential for cryptographic attacks against web services

vulnerability_to_control_mappings.vulnerability_name: SSH Server CBC Mode Ciphers Enabled

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: SSH CBC ciphers represent cryptographic weakness
xacta_mappings.business_impact: Medium - Potential cryptographic attacks against SSH connections

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: ERP server kernel vulnerabilities require coordinated patching
xacta_mappings.business_impact: High - ERP system contains critical business data

xacta_mappings.mapping_rationale: HR system .NET vulnerabilities require urgent patching
xacta_mappings.business_impact: High - HR system contains sensitive employee data

control_implementation_gaps.gap_description: Quarterly account reviews not consistently performed

tenable_evidence.rationale: SMB vulnerabilities indicate potential for unauthorized account access

control_implementation_gaps.gap_description: Critical vulnerabilities not patched within required timeframes

tenable_evidence.rationale: EternalBlue vulnerabilities indicate systemic patching delays
Apache vulnerabilities show web server patch management gaps
Kernel vulnerabilities across multiple RHEL systems

control_implementation_gaps.remediation_approach: Establish coordinated enterprise patch management program

control_implementation_gaps.gap_description: Weak cryptographic configurations across multiple systems

tenable_evidence.rationale: SSH CBC cipher mode usage indicates cryptographic weakness

control_implementation_gaps.remediation_approach: Implement enterprise cryptographic standards and configuration management
